statements: SELECT * FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE quantity_ordered > 100;
SELECT product_id, customer_name, order_date FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quantity_ordered FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE quantity_ordered < 50 ORDER BY quantity_ordered ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE quantity_ordered > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, quantity_ordered FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM ProductDemandAnalysis GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_ordered > 500;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(quantity_ordered) AS avg_quantity_ordered FROM ProductDemandAnalysis GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_quantity_ordered > 50 ORDER BY avg_quantity_ordered DESC;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, order_date FROM ProductDemandAnalysis WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demand WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM customer_demand WHERE order_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM customer_demand ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock_quantity < 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, last_restock_date FROM product_inventory ORDER BY last_restock_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, demand_quantity, order_date FROM customer_demand WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_quantity, last_restock_date FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM customer_demand GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, demand_quantity FROM customer_demand WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND product_name LIKE 'Product%';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, demand_quantity, order_date FROM customer_demand WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, material, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, material, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE material = 'Wood';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_date, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.quantity > 3;
SELECT trend_description FROM trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, sale_amount FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = f.product_id WHERE f.feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
